action.action-desc: Mr. Lawler (for himself, Mr. Stauber, Ms. Tenney, and Mr. Davis of North Carolina) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to increase the scope of the penalty for crimes against children.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Paula Bohovesky and Joan D’Alessandro Act.

section.header: Death or Imprisonment for Crimes Against Children
section.text: Section 3559(d)(1)(A) of title 18, United States Code, is amended by inserting after 14 years the following: or if the victim has not attained the age of 18 years if the conviction involved a sexual offense.
